newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - New York Times front page - Aug 23.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - New York Times front page - Aug 23.

text.p: The New York Times reported the following stories on its front page on Friday:
* Scientific evidence has been found that an explosive device detonated in cabin of Trans World Airlines jet that crashed over Atlantic ocean.
* Calm facade of crash investigators has masked chaos, distrust and courage.
* President Bill Clinton signs bill cutting welfare.
* States are anxious about greater responsibility under welfare reform.
* Top aide to Russian President Boris Yeltsin and Chechen rebels sign a peace pact.
* American students continue to improve their Scholastic Aptitude Test scores.
* The rate of corporate layoffs has fallen from the early 1990s but is still well above that of a decade ago.
* Islamic religious leaders are helping bring some order to Somalia's chaos.
